Fantastic torrent, thank you.

Well worth the seven days it took for the download to finish. The quality of the files are very high and if you're not in the habit of downloading HD video rips (like me) it may surprise you.

Episodes are confirmed uncensored.

Files are in folders named Seizoen which I believe is Dutch leading me to believe the original origin of the DVDs or airing may be The Netherlands (Nederland).

SP info: As far as I know, the first eight (8) seasons of SP are not available uncensored, at least in the United States. If some are, the later seasons are most likely (Seasons 7 or 8) on DVDs I've never seen from outside the USA and Canada. I'm almost positive the first six seasons South Park were made originally censored. If anyone knows different, I'd like to know.

Hope the info helps the curious.
